trans-unit.source: Represents a column of cells that contain links in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 링크를 포함 하는 셀의 열을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewLinkColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that respond to user clicks.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewLinkColumn 클래스는 특수 한 유형의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>논리적으로 호스트 하는 데 사용 되는 클래스에는 사용자가 클릭할 때 응답 하는 셀.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewLinkColumn class is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> class but provides a different user experience that may be more appropriate in certain situations, such as displaying a URL stored in a database table.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewLinkColumn 클래스는 비슷합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>클래스에는 있지만 데이터베이스 테이블에 저장 된 URL을 표시 하는 등의 특정 상황에서 더 적절 한 수 있는 다른 사용자 환경을 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>

trans-unit.source: To display the same link text for every cell, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A> property to the desired link text.
trans-unit.target: 모든 셀에 대 한 같은 링크 텍스트를 표시 하려면 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>속성을 `true` 설정 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A>속성을 원하는 링크 텍스트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewLinkColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewLinkColumn에는 연결 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>모든 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>과 교차 하는 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 열 형식에 대 한 기본 정렬 모드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: To respond to user link clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 링크 클릭에 응답 하려면 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to clicks anywhere in the cell.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>셀에서 아무 곳 이나 클릭에 응답 하는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When initializing a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> instance, this constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> instance.
trans-unit.target: 새 초기화할 때 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>인스턴스를이 생성자는 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성을 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>인스턴스.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 열에 있는 셀 내부의 활성 링크를 표시 하는 데 사용할 색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 선택 되는 링크를 표시 하는 데 사용할 색을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 사용자의 Internet Explorer에 대 한 설정 링크의 색 가리키기 상태에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 새 셀을 만드는 데 사용 되는 템플릿을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>클래스에서이 속성에 새로 만든된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> 을 초기화</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> 하는 것에 대 한 생성자

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 셀 서식 파일의 속성 변경 즉시 영향을 주지 것입니다 열의 기존 셀의 사용자 인터페이스 (UI).

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 열 다시 생성 한 후 이러한 변경 된 것만 (예를 들어 열 정렬 이나 호출을 통해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 있는 다른 열의 모든 셀에는 다음에 모델링 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값으로이 속성을 설정 없는 경우 형식의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 이 칼럼의 정확한 복사본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of link cells.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 링크 셀의 열을 복제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>복제 된 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of links within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 열에 있는 셀 내부의 링크 동작을 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref> value indicating the link behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"> </xref> 링크 동작을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an unselected link within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 열에 있는 셀 내부의 선택 되지 않은 링크를 표시 하는 데 사용할 색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to initially display a link.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 처음 링크를 표시 하는 데 사용할 색을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the link color.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 사용자의 Internet Explorer 설정을 링크 색에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the link text displayed in a column's cells if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 경우 열의 셀에 표시 되는 링크 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue*>은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue*>

trans-unit.source: The text is visible if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트를 표시 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, each cell's link text is populated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property of each cell.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않은 경우 각 셀의 링크 텍스트는 채워집니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>각 셀의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the Text property value for individual cells by setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `false` after setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 셀을 설정 하 여 개별 셀에 대 한 텍스트 속성 값을 재정의할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>속성을 `false` 열을 설정한 후 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the link text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>링크 텍스트를 포함 합니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값을 설정할 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 열을 설명 하는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>열을 설명 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color if it has been visited.
trans-unit.target: 방문한 적이 있으면 링크 색이 변경 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When TrackVisitedState is true, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property value is used to display links that have already been visited.
trans-unit.target: TrackVisitedState 참인 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A>속성 값 열어 본 링크를 표시 하는 데 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>을 선택 하면 링크 색이 변경 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the link text.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*>속성 값이 링크 텍스트로 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the link text; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue*> property value is displayed as the link text.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <> </> *> 속성 값이 링크 텍스트로 표시 됩니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우 셀 <> </> *> 속성 값이 링크 텍스트로 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.
trans-unit.target: 이전에 열어 보았던 링크를 표시 하는 데 사용 하는 색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A> property is set to false, the VisitedLinkColor property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A>속성이 false로 설정 되어 있으면 VisitedLinkColor 속성은 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 열어 보았던 링크를 표시 하는 데 사용할 색을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 사용자의 Internet Explorer를 열어 본된 링크 색에 대 한 설정입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate*>
